\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}[ampersand replacement=\&]
	{\,} \& {M^l } \&\& {M^n} \&\& {M^m} \& {\,} \\
	\&\& {(X, M)}
	\arrow["{\mathbf A^T \cdot}", from=1-2, to=1-4]
	\arrow[two heads, from=1-2, to=2-3]
	\arrow["{\mathbf B^T\cdot }", from=1-4, to=1-6]
	\arrow[hook, from=2-3, to=1-4]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
